The political Left has fumed over Tea Party applications for 501 ( c ) 4 non-profit status in the wake of the 2010 Citizens United Supreme Court decision , as it allows the organizations thus designated to conduct some overtly political activity as long as they are primarily engaged in operations to promote the social welfare .
